INSPIRATIONAL_QUOTES: 💪 It ain't about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward. 💥
🏆 Every champion was once a contender who refused to give up. 🥇
🥊 Going in one more round when you don't think you can – that's what makes all the difference in your life. 💯
👊 You, me, or nobody is gonna hit as hard as life. But it ain't about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward. 💥
🔄 If I can change and you can change, everybody can change. 🌍
🔥 You're gonna have to go through hell, worse than any nightmare you ever dreamed. But in the end, I know you'll be the one standing. 🏅
💪 Now, if you know what you're worth, then go out and get what you're worth. But you gotta be willing to take the hits. 💥
🌈 The world ain't all sunshine and rainbows. It's a very mean and nasty place and I don't care how tough you are, it will beat you to your knees and keep you there permanently if you let it. 💪
